arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the EC2 Instance Connect Endpoint.

availabilityZone.description: The Availability Zone of the EC2 Instance Connect Endpoint.

dnsName.description: The DNS name of the EC2 Instance Connect Endpoint.

fipsDnsName.description: The DNS name of the EC2 Instance Connect FIPS Endpoint.

networkInterfaceIds.description: The IDs of the ENIs that Amazon EC2 automatically created when creating the EC2 Instance Connect Endpoint.

ownerId.description: The ID of the AWS account that created the EC2 Instance Connect Endpoint.

preserveClientIp.description: Indicates whether your client's IP address is preserved as the source. Default: `true`.

securityGroupIds.description: One or more security groups to associate with the endpoint. If you don't specify a security group, the default security group for the VPC will be associated with the endpoint.

subnetId.description: The ID of the subnet in which to create the EC2 Instance Connect Endpoint.

tags.description: Map of tags to assign to this resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

vpcId.description: The ID of the VPC in which the EC2 Instance Connect Endpoint was created.

preserveClientIp.description: Indicates whether your client's IP address is preserved as the source. Default: `true`.

securityGroupIds.description: One or more security groups to associate with the endpoint. If you don't specify a security group, the default security group for the VPC will be associated with the endpoint.

subnetId.description: The ID of the subnet in which to create the EC2 Instance Connect Endpoint.

tags.description: Map of tags to assign to this resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering InstanceConnectEndpoint resources.
